item.title: How to Create a Log in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Create a Log in Notepad: With Menu With Keyboard With Code No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Create a Log in Notepad With Menu Step 1: First open a Notepad window. In the upper left click the “Edit” button. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Time/Date”. Notepad inserts the current time and date into the document.
